item.title: DisenGCD: A Meta Multigraph-assisted Disentangled Graph Learning Framework for Cognitive Diagnosis
item.description: DisenGCD, a meta multigraph framework, disentangles graph learning for cognitive diagnosis, achieving robust student knowledge assessment.

item.title: IWBVT: Instance Weighting-based Bias-Variance Trade-off for Crowdsourcing
item.description: IWBVT: A novel instance weighting approach significantly improves model quality in crowdsourcing by mitigating the impact of intractable instances and achieving a bias-variance trade-off.

item.title: Off-Policy Selection for Initiating Human-Centric Experimental Design
item.description: First-Glance Off-Policy Selection (FPS) revolutionizes human-centric AI by enabling personalized policy selection for new participants without prior data, improving learning and healthcare outcomes.

item.title: SocraticLM: Exploring Socratic Personalized Teaching with Large Language Models
item.description: SocraticLM achieves a Socratic teaching paradigm, surpassing GPT-4 by 12%, through a novel multi-agent training pipeline and a comprehensive evaluation system.
